snippet.title: Drive 2020 - VR Arcade Racing Trailer
snippet.description:
It's been a busy year with a lot of development and updates to the game. To celebrate this and the release of Update 7 we've cut a new trailer showing some of the fun and mayhem you can expect when you play Drive.

Thanks to everyone who bought the game and for all the feedback and community support throughout the year.

You can find the game on Steam here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/993840/Drive/

And if you want join our community discord you can find it here:
https://discord.com/invite/sQQg9Fp

Enjoy!
